original_text: And they shall take all the vessels of the service that are used in the sanctuary and put them in a cloth of blue and cover them with a covering of goatskin and put them on the carrying frame.
korean_text: 성소에서 봉사하는 데에 쓰는 모든 기구를 취하여 청색 보자기에 싸서 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮어 메는 틀 위에 두고

sentences.original_text: And they shall take all the vessels of the service
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 봉사에 쓰이는 모든 기구들을 가져가고

sentences.original_text: that are used in the sanctuary
and put them in a cloth of blue
and cover them with a covering of goatskin
and put them on the carrying frame.
sentences.korean_translation: 운반하는 틀 위에 그것들을 놓아야 한다.
